runs.comm: a bit of outswing there, but it started wide enough for Kallis to let it go
gets closer to Kallis this time, stays full, gets some shape, Kallis's pad comes in the way of the bat, but he is hit outside the line of off
pulls the length back a little, Kallis looks to cut, gets the bottom edge towards Bravo at second slip
this is full, shaping away, played down to third man, Kallis is off
back of a length, angling across, played with an open face towards point
another full delivery, played towards cover, no slower deliveries from Taylor in the first over
back of a length, gets it high, defended towards Bravo at that short-point position
yorker, 138ks, Smith looks to dig it out but is beaten outside off
another full delivery, on the stumps this time, driven down to mid-on
this is very well timed, fast length delivery across him, driven, bounces over Bravo at short point and runs away
nice, classical straight drive, overpitched this time, and Smith goes straight, not much muscle in it, just timing down the ground
doesn't give him driving length this time, hit down to mid-off, powerfully enough for them to not contemplate a single
Kallis is looking to manufacture now, backs away and looks to go inside out, but Taylor bowls back of a length and follows him, hit to mid-off
yorker gone wrong, nice fulltoss on the pads, flicked away, very fine, easy four runs
lovely shot, makes room and this time Taylor doesn't follow him, bowls the cutter but Kallis sees it well and lofts it over extra, sweet timing again
doesn't move around this time, the ball angles into him, and he gets one to wide of mid-on
there it is, the first misfield, full delivery played towards short midwicket, where Dwayne Bravo doesn't get down properly and lets through one
now we know why Taylor hasn't been bowling the slower bouncer, because the first one he tries is picked by Kallis who rocks back and pulls it emphatically into the vast open spaces on the on side
back of a length, angling across, Smith swings and misses, there was some movement away
stays back of a length, steered down to third man
pitched up, driven crisply, but can't beat extra cover
crash! length delivery, wide, and Kallis opens both his arms and the face of the bat, going squarer this time and finding the gap
lucky there, fine leg was in the circle, and he angled this one into the pads, luckily for Edwards, Kallis played it straight towards the fielder
Bravo saves three, another poor delivery, wide and full, driven powerfully, but Bravo dives full length at extra cover
starts off back of a length, into the stumps, played to short midwicket
angled into the pads, Kallis looks to flick but misses, gets one leg-bye nonetheless
shot, driven on the up, lovely shot, it was short of a length, but Smith stood tall, got the width and crashed it through covers
another smart shot, slower ball, from round the stumps, angling in, Smith knows the fine leg is up, he delays the shot, gets enough bat to beat the fielder and gets four
looks for the big loft over the bowler's head, and plays down the wrong line
another superb on-the-up drive, angling across, Smith stands tall again and gets on the top of the bounce, and goes through extra cover this time
round the wicket to Kallis, back of a length outside off, single to short third
flights it, Smith clears the front leg, looks to go down the ground, but gets the splice of the bat and clears in-fielders on the off side
lucky this time, makes room, looking to go over extra, Benn follows him, gets the nick, pretty thick, and it flies to the third-man boundary
steps out and goes towards wide long-on, where Chanderpaul makes a good running save to his left
he has manufactured one shot too many, makes room again, finds the ball a bit short, goes through with the shot, the thick outside edge lobs it to backward point
full, angled into him, played in front of his pad, towards short midwicket
back of a length, outside off, played down to third man
stays back of a length, on the stumps, turned to short midwicket
sweeps this one away, likes the gentle medium-pace, gets on a knee, and capitalises on the fine leg being in
four lucky runs this time, flashes outside off, gets a big inside edge, and gets four to fine leg
angled into the pads, gets one to deep backward square
outside off, Kallis walks across and gets one to third man
SA enjoying their luck here, short, not wide enough to cut, Kallis flashes, gets a faint outside edge that goes fine for four
back of a length, cut away towards sweeper-cover
slows it up a bit, Gibbs plays it in front of his pad
flighted again, Gibbs plays for the spin, but this one goes with the arm
quicker now, 69mph, played back to Benn
slower again, angled in, turned around the corner, but straight to short fine, good comeback after the first-ball four
length ball, outside off, driven hard, Sarwan makes a good save at extra cover
flighted outside off, some turn, big shout too, but Benson thinks it's too high
flat and full, played straight to midwicket
clears the front leg and flat-bats this full delivery straight, superb placement
good batting, now just bunts this into the on side and runs very hard to get two
flat, and full, played back to the bowler
short and straight, Kallis looks to pull, this one is too quick, though, but he gets one to long-on
steps out and makes room, Benn throws it wide, Gibbs recovers well, opens the face more and gets it over point
flighted outside off, gets one to long-off
angled into the pads, gets an easy single to deep midwicket
flighted on the off stump, driven down the ground
back of a length, drops it towards cover and runs
driven on the up, down to long-off
slower, wide, and cut away to sweeper-cover
fulltoss, hit powerfully to sweeper-cover
steps out, Bravo bowls a slower one, Gibbs goes straight, and gets one to long-on
another edged boundary, short and wide, though, Kallis goes for the cut, gets a faint edge, and third man is too square for this one
top shot, Kallis takes two steps out of the crease, Bravo bowls a bouncer, Kallis stands tall and dismisses it out of his presence, lovely pull shot
and is welcome with open arms by Gibbs, who clears his front leg and lofts this full delivery straight down the ground, it reaches the ropes on a half-volley
short, angling across, played straight to short third, wrong ball to bowl, Simmons is lucky here
full delivery, looks for the big loft, but gets an inside edge for one
driven on the up again, wide of sweeper-cover, easy two
Kallis is gone, looks for the big straight hit, times it well, but doesn't get enough power and picks out long-on
full, opens the face to get one to short third man
full, outside off, and played for one to extra cover
yorker, played down to long-off, AB is off
steps out, yorks himself, but plays it to wide of mid-on and gets two
Pollard stays full, driven down the ground for one
slower full delviery, AB drives it forcefully, Pollard gets down in time and gets a hand on it, else this was four
driven on the up, down to long-off
length ball on the pads, turned away for one to deep backward square
back of a length, hit to extra cover and they scamper through for one
clears the front leg and looks for big heave, hits straight to short midwicket
slaps this short delivery down the ground, it's hit straight and long-off is wide
this was in his slot, clears his front leg, meets the length ball with a slog, sweet sound out of the bat, and a sweet six for him
Bravo flies at long-off but can't hold on to this one, slower ball it was, driven to wide of long-off, Bravo dives full length, but can only get his left hand to it
back of a length, slapped down the ground
nice deft touch to get to his 50, a paddle sweep so fine that the fine leg has no chance to stop it, in the middle of a superb innings, is Gibbs
that's a freebie, fulltoss on the pads, and whipped away square, looking dangerous now
they've got Gibbs, against the run of the play, got too close to this one, was looking to clear midwicket, but didn't get enough elevation, and Taylor holds on to an easy catch
sweetly hit right away, down the ground, for one
short outside off, dabbed down to third man
nicely played, opens the face, from in front of stumps, beats Gayle at short third man, but the captain chases well, sticks his boot out to save the boundary
short, spinning in, cut away to short third
was just hinting to go for the reverse, Benn pulls the length back, and like lightning AB rocks back and pulls it to midwicket
looks for the big sweep, slips down while doing so, gets one. I remember once he slipped while sweeping in Ahmedabad, and hit it out of the ground, and quite a big ground we have at Motera
deft, smart, runs it down, uses all Benn's pace, beats Sarwan at short third, the outfield is fast
goes round the wicket, darts it in, Morkel plays it back to him
welcomes Taylor with a front-foot pull, the front leg is out of the way, and this is not even very short, just quick hands

big wicket again, Gayle keeps his cool wearing those yellow-rimmed glasses, AB makes room and goes for the big hit down the ground, splices it to the orbit, Gayle at extra cover gets under it and holds on to it, finally those glasses are working
bowls a bouncer, but gives him width too, upper-cut easily, finds the gap too
that's a better bouncer, from round the wicket, angling in, chasing his throat, Albie pulls his head out of the way
short, cut away, straight to point
bowled him, yorker, base of off, lovely bowling, Albie looks to make room and play it behind square but is late on it. Will these wickets slow SA down?
short, into the body, played to wide of deep midwicket and gets two
slower ball goes wrong, way down the leg side
short outside off, Boucher looks to cut but is beaten by the extra bounce
full, on the middle stump, hit down to long-on

another wicket, golden duck for Duminy, and a dot ball, Edwards goes for the bouncer, Duminy pulls, gets a top edge, Sarwan doesn't pick it to begin with at deep fine leg, but recovers to hold on to it low to his left
short, straight, cut to point for one
slower ball, beats VDM outside off, but it is called wide, that has to bee harsh, was touch and go
full, driven nicely, but can't beat extra cover
full and straight, beats van der Merwe on the flick
another one goes down, VDM plays like only he can, his head falling away and slogging big, gets a top edge that goes nowhere but straight up into the sky, another dot ball too
yorker on the leg stump, pretty well played, turned away to square leg, gets two
good running, another yorker, dug out, goes slowly towards long-on and they scamper hard for two
slower ball, just short of a length, Boucher looks to pull, but plays over it
nice stuff, the orthodox bouncer, Boucher is beaten on the pull again, very nice comeback by Taylor
short outside off, cut away to sweeper-cover
shot, big shot, Boucher gets a much-needed six, clears his front leg, finds a length ball right in his slot, and frees his arms to loft it over cow corner
good comeback, yorker outside off, played for one to cover
looks to scoop, fine leg - Fletcher - is up, he leaps full length to get a hand, then gets up again and does the retrieving, saves one run
sharp bouncer, perfect height too, head high, beats Boucher's pull
a yorker, hit down the ground, not powerfully, gets two
